ygData.subject: Candidate precedence
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, I want to assign a precedence score for each URI according to information of its parent. The WARC of the parent need to be process and so it takes few

Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset=us-ascii

Hello,

I want to assign a precedence score for each URI according to infor=
mation of its parent. 
The WARC of the parent need to be process and so it =
takes few seconds to extract the needed information. That's why heritrix ha=
s to wait before adding the candidate URI to the frontier.

I try a Thread.=
sleep() into my precedence method but all heritrix stops. 
In fact i just w=
ant to subscribe my method to an event, or to wait x seconds, before adding=
 my new candidate to the frontier but meanwhile, i want that heritrix keep =
crawling enqueued URI. 
Where and how can I do that ?
Maybe, it should be b=
etter to add all candidate URI without precedence, and to re-order the cand=
idate list into the frontier ? (where exactly ?)

Thank's a lot

Romain 
--=
 -- --


--Apple-Mail=_7B570A0F-7BF6-497E-A954-6A8C99CA392C
